page.title: 19Shopping around Henham
page.content: The shops people would most like in Henham were Butcher Greengrocer Baker D.I.Y bank.For food most people shop in Bishop Stortford.Other popular towns for food shopping were Harlow Stansted Hertford and Henham.Bishop Stortford is also most popular for clothes shopping.Chelmsford, Cambridge,Harlow and London were also used.Henham Stores was mainly used for day to day shopping.Most people shopping daily which surprised us.Next was weekly.Most people bought both Fresh and Frozen food.No-one bought only Frozen food,a few bought just Fresh food .We were surprised that most people enjoyed shopping but not surprised that most found food too expensive.Class 1 at our school did not like shopping.
